# Morningstar
## Overview
A morningstar is a spiked metal ball, affixed to the top of a long handle.


-tx-

|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **One-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Morningstar | 8 gp | 1d6 | 1d8 | x2 | — | 6 lbs. | B and P | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 147
